name: SpaceRunner (ShamansDock)
description:
https://github.com/ShamansGit/SpaceRunner

[WARNING: sound does not work in the HTML version and is VERY laggy (in some circumstances). for sound (and probably less bugs) download the game instead, which i highly recommend. it is a small download.]

kill monsters and survive the dust storm when you crash on a moon in this infinite retro-esce side-scrolling 2d platformer! (what a mouthful)

i only found this game jam halfway through, so i only had 15 days. hope its still fun though :)

[GUIDE]

if you often get pwned like a noob, take this guide.
-your hp bar is displayed as the orange text at the bottom of the screen. if it reaches 0...ded.
-your jetpack has a limited capacity, displayed as the blue-y energy orb on the jetpack.this capacity recharges faster on the ground.
-when you start playing, a sandstorm will start following you. this storm gives damage. do not touch storm. in fact, the storm is so powerful it will damage you under cover, so the best(only) option is to run.
-chests are little green boxes which you can shoot to give you a HEART. hearts restore your health to max.
-sometimes you will come across an entrance of a cave. these caves will offer a higher risk but also a higher reward.
